column5: Modern paradise on 27 acres! This contemporary home brings the outdoors in with lots of windows and open 2 story living room. Built in vacuum system throughout house. Main fireplace features built in blower system. Mother in law suite has a second kitchen, and fireplace, full bath with shower only. Fenced in backyard is fully landscaped with a gazebo, and an in ground gunite pool with water feature. Water tank is stocked with fish - perch, catfish, and bass.
